trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager administration | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager administration | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Provides an overview and links to more information about StorSimple Snapshot Manager solution administration tasks and workflows.
trans-unit.target: Provides an overview and links to more information about StorSimple Snapshot Manager solution administration tasks and workflows.

trans-unit.source: Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to administer your StorSimple solution
trans-unit.target: Use StorSimple Snapshot Manager to administer your StorSimple solution

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager is a Microsoft Management Console (MMC) snap-in that simplifies data protection and backup management in a Microsoft Azure StorSimple environment.
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager is a Microsoft Management Console (MMC) snap-in that simplifies data protection and backup management in a Microsoft Azure StorSimple environment.

trans-unit.source: With StorSimple Snapshot Manager, you can manage Microsoft Azure StorSimple data in the data center and in the cloud as a single integrated storage solution, thus simplifying backup processes and reducing costs.
trans-unit.target: With StorSimple Snapshot Manager, you can manage Microsoft Azure StorSimple data in the data center and in the cloud as a single integrated storage solution, thus simplifying backup processes and reducing costs.

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager central management console enables you to create consistent, point-in-time backup copies of local and cloud data.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager central management console enables you to create consistent, point-in-time backup copies of local and cloud data.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the console to:
trans-unit.target: For example, you can use the console to:

trans-unit.source: Configure, back up, and delete volumes.
trans-unit.target: Configure, back up, and delete volumes.

trans-unit.source: Configure volume groups to ensure that backed up data is application-consistent.
trans-unit.target: Configure volume groups to ensure that backed up data is application-consistent.

trans-unit.source: Manage backup policies so that data is backed up on a predetermined schedule.
trans-unit.target: Manage backup policies so that data is backed up on a predetermined schedule.

trans-unit.source: Create independent copies of data, which can be stored in the cloud and used for disaster recovery.
trans-unit.target: Create independent copies of data, which can be stored in the cloud and used for disaster recovery.

trans-unit.source: This article provides links to tutorials that describe StorSimple Snapshot Manager and how to use it to complete system administration tasks and workflows.
trans-unit.target: This article provides links to tutorials that describe StorSimple Snapshot Manager and how to use it to complete system administration tasks and workflows.

trans-unit.source: For more information about StorSimple Snapshot Manager components and architecture, see [What is StorSimple Snapshot Manager?](storsimple-what-is-snapshot-manager.md)
trans-unit.target: For more information about StorSimple Snapshot Manager components and architecture, see [What is StorSimple Snapshot Manager?](storsimple-what-is-snapshot-manager.md)

trans-unit.source: To download StorSimple Snapshot Manager, go to [the StorSimple Snapshot Manager download page](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=44220).
trans-unit.target: To download StorSimple Snapshot Manager, go to [the StorSimple Snapshot Manager download page](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=44220).

trans-unit.source: For StorSimple Snapshot Manager deployment procedures, go to [Deploy StorSimple Snapshot Manager](storsimple-snapshot-manager-deployment.md).
trans-unit.target: For StorSimple Snapshot Manager deployment procedures, go to [Deploy StorSimple Snapshot Manager](storsimple-snapshot-manager-deployment.md).

trans-unit.source: StorSimple Snapshot Manager tasks and workflows
trans-unit.target: StorSimple Snapshot Manager tasks and workflows

trans-unit.source: You can use the StorSimple Snapshot Manager to monitor and manage current, scheduled, and completed backup jobs.
trans-unit.target: You can use the StorSimple Snapshot Manager to monitor and manage current, scheduled, and completed backup jobs.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, StorSimple Snapshot Manager provides a catalog of up to 64 completed backups.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, StorSimple Snapshot Manager provides a catalog of up to 64 completed backups.

trans-unit.source: You can use the catalog to find and restore volumes or individual files.
trans-unit.target: You can use the catalog to find and restore volumes or individual files.
